nodes.text: Bluebarb wasps were a type of creature with the ability to sting individuals and cause swelling. The Duros Shriv Suurgav once entered a nest of bluebarb wasps during his childhood, and was stung badly in the face as a result. His stings were later treated with antivenin.
Bluebarb wasps were mentioned in Resistance Reborn, a 2019 novel written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
